info.name: Opera Lucid Mode - enhance video by sharpening
info.description: Now you can add Lucid Mode from Opera to other browsers! This little CSS snippet will sharpen all videos on every website for better quality.
info.additionalInfo:
If you want more sharpening, edit the filter source code and paste this kernel matrix:
-0.5 -0.5 -0.5 -0.5 5 -0.5 -0.5 -0.5 -0.5
or:
-1 -1 -1 -1 9 -1 -1 -1 -1

style.css:
video {
    filter: url('data:image/svg+xml,\
        <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">\
          <filter id="sharpen">\
            <feConvolveMatrix order="3" preserveAlpha="true" kernelMatrix="1 -1 1 -1 -1 -1 1 -1 1"/>\
          </filter>\
        </svg>#sharpen')
}
